what: the option to delete a preset filter from filter preset dropdown in a record list.
why: to provide the user with the option to delete a preset filter.

what: the option to sort the system fields `ownedBy`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`, `deletedBy` and the fields user and record in a record list.
why: to make sorting/viewing data easier for the user.

what: option to clone a page layout by adding two sub options - for cloning a page with page block reference and for cloning a page without page block reference.
In the first case, configuration changes that are made to the original page's blocks are also reflected to the copied page's page blocks.
As for the other option, the changes made to the original page's blocks are not reflected to the copied page's page blocks.
why: to provide the user with the option to choose whether the copied page's block configuration should be shared among pages.

what: the UI for uploading a namespace by showing a spinner while data is being processed and hiding the name and handle field of the namespace instead of showing the spinner and fields at the same time.
why: to be consistent with the UI in Corteza.

what: the handle field for a user to not be required when updating the resource in {APP_NAME_ADMIN}.
